titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that China is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic and must be held financially liable for $16,000,000,000,000.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that China is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic and must be held financially liable for $16,000,000,000,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that China's government is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic and should be held financially responsible for the pandemic's cost.
